alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 29 at 2:13AM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches, except 9 to 16 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains and the Island Park area. This includes the towns of Kilgore, Island Park, and Last Chance. * WHEN...From noon today to noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate wind will make it difficult to keep roads clear due to drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
